document_data.name: Eckert
document_data.mainbody: '''Eckert''' used to be the valet of [[Talbot Uskevren]]
document_data.Notes: In ''[[The Halls of Stormweather]]'', Eckert's name was spelled both Eckart and Eckert several times, but Eckert was used exclusively in ''[[Black Wolf]]''.
